update.title: Updating station data...
update.updated: Login credentials and station data successfully updated.
update.not_found: Station not found! Try to delete device and re add it!
update.error: Error during update station data! Try again.

device.inverter_removed: Connected inverter removed from station, device unavailable!
device.waiting_for_inverter: Waiting for inverter connection (usually next data update)...

inverter.max_retries_reached: Maximum number of API call attempts reached! The system has tried to connect multiple times but has now hit the limit for allowed requests. Check your connection and API settings to avoid repeated failed attempts.
